item.title: More rubbish dumped, 16th February
item.description:
As soon as you removed flytipped rubbish, within hours more dumped! Please remove thanks Also Can you PLEASE put up a “no flytipping “. Sign in this spot ? It’s becoming a daily problem

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21-24, Monteagle Way, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged pavement edge outside 117 Latchmere Road SW11 2JY, 16th February
item.description:
The pavement on this stretch of Latchmere Road is brick, with concrete added to bridge the gap between the footway and individual house paths. Outside 117's front gate this has now cracked badly, a large central section became so loose that it was a serious trip hazard for visitors, postmen, couriers etc. That has therefore been removed and is beside the house wall as shown in the second photo. The surface remains uneven with bare earth now exposed, so the concrete will need to be made good.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66-68, Latchmere Road, Clapham Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
